seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 5 years experience required with advanced responsibilities like designing data platforms and optimizing scalable pipelines, which aligns with senior level expectations despite no 'Senior' prefix in title

job_family.evidence: Title is explicitly 'Data Engineer' with core focus on building data pipelines, ETL processes, and data platform engineering

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions both 'real-time streaming data pipelines' with Kafka and 'batch data processing' for ETL/ELT processes, indicating hybrid processing approach

leadership_expectation.evidence: Mentions working 'as part of the data engineering team' and collaborating with other engineers, with no mention of direct reports or people management responsibilities

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'AWS, Azure, or GCP' as options for major cloud platforms with no clear primary cloud preference stated

secondary_clouds.evidence: Since primary cloud is multi-cloud approach, no additional secondary clouds beyond the three mentioned

processing_paradigm.evidence: Clearly states both 'real-time streaming data pipelines' and 'batch data processing' requirements, indicating hybrid processing paradigm

orchestrator_category.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Apache Airflow or similar' as required experience with data orchestration tools

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions both data lakes for unstructured data and cloud-native storage solutions including S3/Blob Storage (lake) and BigQuery/Redshift (warehouse)

remote_restriction.evidence: Specific location requirement for Bengaluru, Karnataka, India with no mention of remote work options, indicating regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or overlap specifications mentioned despite location being in India

relocation_required.evidence: Position is based in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India with no mention of relocation assistance or requirements, suggesting local candidates preferred

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned and being an Indian company in India, H1B sponsorship would not be applicable or relevant

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support and being an Indian company, OPT/CPT programs would not be applicable

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work authorization requirements specified for the Indian position

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Appears to be full-time employment at Accenture with no mention of contract work, suggesting traditional W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits, equity, PTO, health insurance, or other compensation details mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No mention of career paths, growth opportunities, advancement potential, or promotion tracks in the job description

mentorship_signals.evidence: No mentorship programs, senior guidance, or collaborative learning opportunities mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotion opportunities, advancement paths, or career growth within the organization

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or exploring different positions within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: No information about IC track, management track, specialist track, or architect track opportunities provided

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between 'Must have skills' with specific technical requirements and 'Good to have skills' marked as NA, indicating strict requirements for core competencies

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description specifically on data engineering responsibilities including pipeline development, ETL processes, and data platform work - not a multi-role hybrid position

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 5 years experience requirement aligns well with senior data engineer level, and skills mentioned (Databricks, PySpark, Airflow) are appropriate and realistic for the role
